lead_paragraph: An article on Sunday about disarray among Israeli leftists because of the continuing conflict with Palestinians referred incorrectly to the ''right of return'' demanded by Yasir Arafat. It is for refugees from the 1948 Arab-Israeli war, not from later Arab-Israeli wars.
abstract: Correction of Nov 11 article about disarray among Israeli leftists because of continuing conflict with Palestinians; so-called right of return demanded by Yasir Arafat is for refugees from 1948 Arab-Israeli war, not from later Arab-Israeli wars
